resources.string: What is this:\n \tThis app helps you quickly retrieve plain text from a desktop to the phone\'s clipboard. Assume you find a website and want to paste the link in a phone app to send to your friend, this is a quick way.\n
How to use:\n \tSelect one of the options below and follow the instructions at the bottom

Use command line:
 adb shell am startservice -n callofdroidy.net.clipboardaccessor/.ServiceClipboardAccessor -e setText "any text content"

This is recommended when your phone is connected to you computer and you know how to use ADB, put the command in a script to call it is even better.
Put this IP:Port in your desktop\'s browser with text as the parameter like this:\n YOUR_IP:8000/?text=HelloWorld
